content.detailedDescription: While driving through a main intersection in the city of warren, with my wife and 2 young daughters, we saw a bright white spotlight shinning on an abandoned building to the left side of the street. the spotlight was moving around randomly and then crossed over to the right side of the street. at first i thought it was from a helicopter and out of curiosity i stopped the car and pulled over to the curb. after the spotlight was turned off, i could see a very large flying wing hovering just above the trees on a side street to my left. once my eyes became adjusted to the light, i could see that the craft had no vertical surfaces and had orange lights around the perimeter of the wing. i could see a large window area in the center area with a grid like window muttins like an old b-52 wwii bomber and a consol with a silohete of a person moving around inside. there was incandecent lighting in the cockpit area. the structure was flat black with a rough surface like graphite with rivets clearly visible on seams. i could see the spotlight on the bottom center in a ball like socket. the craft was silent and made no sounds. after about 5 or six munutes, it started to slowly turn towards the north and fly off in that direction.It took about 3 minutes to pass overhead and i would estimate the size to be about 300 to 400 feet with a thickness or height of about 15 to 20 feet. i tried to follow the craft in my car but got stopped in traffic. i thought it would be on the news but nothing was ever said about the craft. i thought it might be an experimental lighter than air craft. i have reported this to different agencies over the years but never got a response. this was not just a light in the sky, this was something close and very visible. i served as a radar techician in the army and  i know how to identify aircraft. all though this occured quite a while ago, i can still see it it my mind.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A very large flying wing black craft hovering just above trees.

content.detailedDescription: I wanted to repost this sighting because after studying the photo i think the black rod was not only large it looks like to me that it passed through the vapor trail behind the airplane.Maybe you can take a better look.
content.summary: Large black rod.

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting was over 30 years ago, but i think it should be documented. i was outside my house on the northeast corner of 6th and reed streets,in philadelphia,pa. talking with my uncle leon, and neighbor moe{both now deceased}. it was early evening we were standing there shooting the breeze,when all of a sudden a ball of light streak almost right above our heads, it was very large,bigger than the size of a tank,and less than a quarter of a block away, facing south on sixth,it seemed like directly over gerritt street, which is the next little street south of reed street,at a very very low altitude, flying parallel to the ground, from west to east,my guess is at less than a thousand feet high.
 the whole incident for me lasted about 5 seconds. this ball of light changed colors faster than my mind could register, red, green, blue, silver, yellow, in no order.It flew so low that, when it passed to the east of sixth street,i couldn't see it for the houses blocked my view, and they are only three stories high.
the next day when i went to work i read in the newspaper that many people had seen it and called into the authorities, and that the ball of light, landed or crashed into the atlantic ocean about a mile from resorts international casino hotel. which is about 48 miles from where i sighted it. what is a coincidence or not is that the incident happened very close to the grand opening of resorts casino in atlantic city. either the day of or the day after, not sure, i also went to the main library in philadelphia to look up this incident in the newspaper archives, but didn't have much time and was unsuccessful finding the article.
also i was asked to report this sighting by ken pfiefer one of your field agents.  
peace!
charles
content.summary: Ball of light streak at very low altitude.

content.detailedDescription: Taking pic of airliner on way to tia caught an unknown object that wasn't seen while taking pic. scanned for birds before snaping pic.Had a real banner week for objects in sky using a reconditioned camera with a viewfinder so my aim is better. also for change of pace another pic taken a few days before of airplane with white dot in pic which at first thought was something unusual but have since decided it was daytime pic of venus after all.Just wanted to show you that you can see venus in daytime.
content.summary: Unknown object.

content.detailedDescription: On car trip from college station texas to dallas texas for high school basketball game with team members. viewed stationary craft near power tower fairly close to ground. watched for several seconds until view blocked due to driving under bridge overpass. upon emerging from overpass, noted object had vanished from sky. no clouds...100% clear weather that day.
content.summary: Low in the sky (level with car window - hundred feet above ground)... near power tower...Silver.. no wings or tail. vanished after 10 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Taking pic of flying birds found a small black rod in pic.First pic above bird small rod, second pic left side of pic and bird small rod.
content.summary: Small black rod.

content.detailedDescription:
I was up one night watching my favorite anime,inuyasha. a commercial break came on and i had to use the restroom. i remember walking through the hallway
of my house and stopping to take a look out the night sky. i looked a little over to the left and i saw a red blinking light. at first, i thought it was a airplane or a satellite but as it got closer, it looked like a metallic ball with a red light orbiting it. it came within at least 7 feet of my window (i was on the top floor) and it was hovering at least 9 to 10 feet off the ground. i was wondering what the heck this was. i opened my window to get a better look but soon as i did it zipped off into the sky. as soon as i saw this, i freaked out. i was wondering the next day if that was a dream or not. i looked into the subject of ufo's and found many people see them. i did not believe about those things until i saw that ufo that night. ever since i have been looking up stories about ufo's and other things. i told my friends about what i saw and they said i watch too many science-fiction movies. i know what i saw that night and i believe there is more to the universe than we think.
content.summary: A metallic sphere with a red blip orbiting.

content.detailedDescription: Taking pic of airliner and found a black object crossing vapor trail did not see object when taking pic.
content.summary: Black object.

content.detailedDescription:
Im still looking for answears. this image has been here every night for years. i smoke alot outside and sometimes im out there for an hour at 4 am watching the skies and ive seen strange things in st charles. this image i attached ive seen a plane get close to it once and it shut off its lights and disappeared. ive seen fire balls fly around the speed of a plane and burn out they're lights and disappear. there are a suspicous number if unmarked airliner like planes seeming to patrol the area although we have an airport, they are too big for this small airport. ive had many strange events like 2 summers ago, every time i would think ufo outside i would see a shooting star after something seemed to possess me to look up at the sky at the exact moment numerous times. i really want to know already if this is a sattelite, ufo or star because it is actaully holding me back from moving on with my life. sometimes i think the mayan theory and 2012 could be the second coming of christ execpt i want to move on with my life and go back to college. someone please please write me and tell me what this thing is. it is the first light you can see in the skies at sunset along with the moon. it is bright very very bright. it is always no higher up than a usual airplane. it moves across the sky as like the stars do, but much much faster. it goes from the south west hemisphere to the northern and dissappears every sunset. ive also seen other stationary lights but i will sit still on the porch for 10 minutes and the lights will go from one side of the tree bracnh to the other side very noticeable within 10 minutes. please help me move on with my life because i am now suffering from schitzophrenia and bipolar depression and it is turning me into a heavens gate like disaster although i am tame. i want to put this issue to rest. i need youre help so study this picture and email me questions for i am 100% sure right now that this is a stationary nightly large ufo, it is obvious to me with all these strange planes that werent there 3 years ago. why i am superspicous is because i went onto this apparition website a few years ago and labeled this apparition of the virgin mary with my philosophy on what it meant with microsoft paint....Refering to my attached image file.             cut  n paste                  http://images.Search.Yahoo.Com/images/view?Back=http%3a%2f%2fimages.Search.Yahoo.Com%2fsearch%2fimages%3fp%3dvirgin%2bmary%2bapparition%2bpictures%26ni%3d20%26ei%3dutf-8%26fr%3dyfp-t-501%26fr2%3dtab-web%26xargs%3d0%26pstart%3d1%26b%3d61&w=255&h=280&imgurl=jesusphotos.Altervista.Org%2fmary_apparition1.Jpg&rurl=http%3a%2f%2fjesusphotos.Altervista.Org%2f&size=13.7kb&name=mary_apparition1.Jpg&p=virgin+mary+apparition+pictures&type=jpg&oid=13b6a77e0ac2c476&no=62&tt=771&sigr=11239s3ls&sigi=11flo5b1o&sigb=14c9jha65 
 my email adress is reharkthte@yahoo.Com  please ask me questions i want to move on from my superspicions.
content.summary: Strange events.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at the dining table looking out towards west when i noticed what i thought was an unusually bright star.I grabbed the binoculars and i watched it for about 15 minutes.My husband saw it too.As i looked at it through binoculars i could see that it appeared to be a lit up triangle shaped craft.As it began to move very slowly west, i got my shoes and coat on to go outside to see it better,but when i got outside it was gone.There were a few airplanes in the area after that,much higher in altitude though but they don't light up bright white or appear in any way a triangle,and they also blink their anti-collision lights.So i don't know what it was,only what i saw from where i was at.I was outside at exactly 7:30-7:35pm.
content.summary: We saw a triangular shaped light  above and in between 2 blinking light towers and it stayed in the same spot for 15 mins., then moved slowly and began to blink all sorts of colors as it got closer, heading west then turning south.

content.detailedDescription:
My mom ruth and i were in shock as i heard the low rumble of this vessel appeared out of what seemed like a wormhole in the time of evening sky. it slowly went forward towards the arkansas-oklahoma border in the evening sky, the ship was very visible even at the altitude of no more than 400 yards this vessel was huge about 2 city blocks wide.  it was like it came out of a wormhole or something as i stood on the porch and looked up and and over my right shoulder.  wow there it was i called out to my mom in the next room and at age 70 she was as much in shock as i was eek!..Ohh my god i said to her there it is i told you guys as i had told my family many times at night i had seen strange vessels cruising the skies. i hurriedly walked out to the street corner for a clearer view as it went over my head towards the northwest. as it went out of my view the evening suddenly the sky went from evening to almost dark, and felt very eerie as the night went to a lighter shade dusk lighter than the left top photo sample. i have tried not to tell too many people about this even, so i feel i must speak out via the www. this even has really traumatized me in many ways as i hardly sleep nowadays. let me just tell you my life has completely changed after viewing this event, i also have had two other encounters with alien visitations, and it had taken me years just to try and recall those events, so what i always knew existed in my heart has become very real to me not only in the visual sighting, but subconsciously as well....
 
i just left my elderly mother standing there as i ran from the porch to the corner of n 8th and q street, i stood there in awe under the street light as it went over my head, and yes i was very afraid at first but for some reason i had to get a closer look at the event.  something else very unusual occurred to me several days later this sighting, i began to itch profusely on my skin, and did not know why i began to itch, just did not pay much attention to it at first but this until several weeks later it got worse.  maybe, possibly i was exposed to some kind of radiation or something i'm sure what an i hope not, however; i'm still feeling the effect of the exposure from this event. i sent a report about this to art bell at a radio program called coastocoast.Com featuring mr. george noory, and i've received no response from them to this date feb.07  a few days later a strange thing happen to my computer hard drive when i tried to boot up to windows and i simply could not, i later found my hard drive had be completely erased by something or someone. all my e-mail's has been deleted as well, shortly after i reported the sighting.  so if anyone can help me possibly help me better understand what has happened to that evening, and since the sighting of this vessel.  you can e-mail me if you can with any helpful information that you may have and thank you very for your interaction, 

a web-site rendering of the ufo event can be seen at this url: 

http://www.Personalized-pc.Com/agent/ufo_vessel_sighting_over_fort_smith_arkansas_sept05.Html

sincerely your james in fort smith, ar
content.summary: Ufo viewed over fort smith, ar in 2003: no more than 400 feet off the ground the vessel was huge about 2 city blocks wide at time of sighting.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bed. then i heard a whistlin sound. so i checked it out. an wham, there it was. sry, but that's all i remember.
content.summary: It landed in the farm by my house.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a secluded wilderness area, on a private hunting club with two other witnesses.Location, st. marks florida, north east of highway 98 along the st. marks river. at 8:22 pm, feb.19th, 2009, we had just finished dinner when we walked outside and noticed a very bright object hovering at about 45 degrees, above the tree tops. at first i thought it may have been the bright runway lights on a commercial airliner going into tallahassee regional airport, but realized that was at least 25 miles away. this object remained almost stationary for a few min. then started moving slowly to the south. i was unable to determine how far away this object was due to the object changing in size, brightness, color and density. 
i want back to my camper, picked up my digital camera, and jumped on my 4-wheeler. i was determined to find a clear point of view and get some still pictures, and at present location the trees were obstructing my view. the two other witnesses remained at camp and kept a visual while i took the nearest logging road, which obstructed my view for a few minuets but was able to see this bright object threw the trees shortly thereafter.
i saw that it was moving slowly south to south west, and followed for aprox. 3 miles until i was able to get a clear view and take a few photos, which did not turn out well due to the delay and flash. i then turned the camera on video, and shot apox. 4 video's ranging from 1-2 min each. after about 30 min. the object remaining on a south to southwest path, lost visual due to the trees, so i returned to camp. there i met up with the other two witnesses, and told them of the event. i was then informed that they had continued to witness the object over the entire duration of my absence, but in a north to northwest directons. it was pointed out to me once again but only visable for a couple more minuets before completely dissapearing. we then determined that there was infact two objects and i had taken after the second one while the were watching the first one. when i uploaded the video, i was surprised to find that once i turned the 4-wheeler motor off, that the audio picked up some sort of signal from the object during filming which i was unaware until the volume was turned up. each time the object morphed, it would give off a strange sound which can be heard on the video. i inhanced the photo's but was only able to blow up what looked like a globe with a cloudish texture, unlike anything i had ever seen. the video's were not zoomed in as close as the pictures, but clearly showed a solid object changing from a small solid bright mass to a large semi solid, less radiated mass. this is the 3rd sighting that i am aware of in the last 4 year.
content.summary: Morph object, changing shape, size, color & brightness, also sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting this for my husband who is pretty much an unbeliever
(meaning he has not personally seen anything he could not identify until tonight) but now he is not so sure, after what he witnessed.
he was leaving our side road which leads to the highway from our house going to work. he had just called a friend he works with and was almost to the highway, coming to a stop at the stop sign when he saw a huge black object traveling over hwy 9. hwy 9 & i-44 intersect about a half mile from here. the area has those turnpike lights along the highway so the area is fairly well lit up. he immediately got off the phone with his friend & tried calling me as he had only gotten a mile from home. but his cell phone wouldn't work for some reason. he sat at the stop sign & watched it until it went over the trees which was over hwy 9 by now. his discription was, at first thought, it was a low flying commercial airplane but he could not see any wings anywhere on it.  it had 5 or 6 lights across the back, red & amber colored, in a straight line. the lights were flashing in a sequence of four then would pause and resume. it did not make any noise at all. he said it was about 1000-2000 ft in altitude, flying or gliding at a slow speed & it was huge. it was traveling south to north over the bridgecreek area. he said from the time he first saw it, the sighting only lasted about 2-3 minutes. we live in the general area where the couple had a sighting back in early jan. he is not what you would call a believer in ufo's but he said this was definately something he could not identify. if anyone else saw this thing tonight, i hope you report it on here.
content.summary: Huge black object with lights across the back traveling south to north.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in 2nd grade.  i don't know if it was the spring or the fall, but it was during recess and the weather was warm enough to play outside.  my classmate and i walked to the side of the school(peebles elementary, north allegheny school district) during recess.  all of the other children were in the main play area at the back of the school.  our school janitor, mr. swann, appeared and waved us over toward the basement area of the school.  there was an entryway into the furnace room of the school.  mr. swann told us to come over and see what was in the furnace room.  inside, there was a small "jetson-like" disc.  it would have been about the size of a volkswagon beetle.  it had seating for two.  i don't have a clear memory of the vehicle except that it was a silver grey metallic color, very smooth.  i can't clearly remember the roof of the craft but i think it was clear or missing entirely. i vaguely remember a panel of controls and something like blue vinyl seats. my friend said "mr. swann caught the flying saucer in the baseball field of the school."  i remember her sliding down against the wall and falling asleep.  then a small grey man appeared from behind the furnace.  i remember laughing because my girlfriend fell asleep, and then being amazed at the little man.  he was about the same size as me.  i was not afraid of him at all.  he talked to me in my head and through feelings and thoughts.  he never moved his mouth.  he had skin the color and shading like ashes from a cigarette.  i don't recall any clothing or any sexual characteristics about him.  he had large black eyes, but they were kind and sincere.  he had no nose, maybe just a couple small holes, and his mouth was just sort of a line.  it did not open.  i dont remember any ears.  he had long arms for the size of his body and i think only 4 fingers on each hand, which seemed very long.  he kept his arms to his sides.  he had two legs and his feet seemed different somehow from ours, i simply cannot remember exactly what they were like. his body was childlike, not muscular at all.
he said to me in my head, "we are here, to remind you, who you are."  i still, to this day, have no idea what he meant! (i am now 49) somehow, i was able to know how the flying saucer worked.  it had something to do with a force of energy which pushed out at the bottom of the craft, along with a corresponding force which sucked in.  it makes me think of what a hover craft is like only with much more force and no sound.  this was what was broken on the craft and the janitor had taken it inside to hide it while the entity was repairing it.  there was another little man somewhere in the room who was injured from the "crash." i have no recollection of him except for the sensing that he was there and that he was hurt.
my mother recalls me coming home from school and talking about mr. swann and the flying saucer, (mom was concerned about me being escorted into the basement of the school by the janitor, but after asking me several questions was satisfied that nothing inappropriate had occured). but i never mentioned the little man.  something tells me i wasn't supposed to remember the man until later in life.  because, i did not remember the man until i was 29.  my school friend only remembers the craft, and described it as having no bolts or rivets (she grew up with a dad who flew a small plane and would know those terms to describe a plane).  she has no recollection of a "little man" but then again, she had fallen asleep when he appeared!
i've told this story to friends and family only, for fear of being ridiculed.  my children are in this school, and it's been remodeled.  i have never asked anyone at the school about the craft or dear mr. swann.
he's got to be in his 80's now.
i sure wish i knew what the little man was referring to when he said they were here to remind me who i was!
content.summary: I was in 2nd grade and saw a jetson type craft and and little gray man talked to me.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was seven years of age, a "giant" red fireball was observed late one night while lying in bed looking out the window at the stars above (most likely in the summer of 1965) near dixon, missouri. 

the hugh red fireball appeared to be much larger than our house and i thought that it was just barely over tree top level. it traveled very slow for a metorite (maybe the speed of a small plane flying over, or slower).

the fireball was covered with and trailing red flames as it flew slowly by horizontal to the ground and not making a noise.

expecting a nearby crash from this giant ball of fire, i covered my head with my pillow awaiting the impact that never came.

the next day i heard on the radio that a large metorite was seen falling in the area the night before and a search was underway to locate it. i never heard another word about it. 

been watching the skies for many years now, and have never seen a anything flying across the sky this large, low, or slow covered with red flames of fire.
content.summary: Huge red flame slow moving horizontal flying fireball.

content.detailedDescription: More pics of rods.
content.summary: Black rods.

content.detailedDescription: for about 1 minute i saw a completely white ufo. it looked metallic, and it was two orbs connected with a white pole in the middle. i was riding in my car home from a doctor's appointment, and i looked oout of the window and saw it. i don't know if anyone else saw it, but it seemed very distinct to me. at first i thought it was a plane, but i soon realized that there were no markings on the plane at all. it was just purely white. i then thought it was a bird, but it was soon going all too fast to be a bird. my mom was driving me home, but i failed to tell her before it left. it seemed to "flicker" as if it just was and then wasn't there, and it was going extremely fast and was not acting like any human thing i've ever seen. it resembles the isaac/caret ufo, but only loosely, as there wasn't any markings on it. it was very odd, and seemed to be struggling about 30 seconds into the sighting. then, the ufo just seemed to dissapear. nothing else, it was just there, and then it wasn't. i started to get freaked out as i am an xenophobic, and i couldn't build up the strength to visit this website until now. thank you for listening.
content.summary: Fly-by over fairfield hills.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving the palms-rancho park library at about 5:15 p.M., getting on my bike when i noticed,what i thought was a slow moving "jet". it was headed east which is the normal flightpath for a lot of the lax air traffic. i then noticed a comercial airline traveling east bound that was higher than the object i was observing. also, there was a private airplane traveling east and banking left (a wide u turn) to head for the santa monica airport west, wich was much lower than the craft. it was moving so slowly that it couldn't have been a normal aircraft.  so i then thought it must be a blimp or baloon.  that's when i really noticed the shape of a triangle.  it was like a burnt-orange or ox-blood color and had some type of markings at the tip of each corner.  the sun had not set yet, so i could not tell if the markings were lights or what.  i've lived in the area for over 18 yrs. so i'm familure w/ the "normal airtraffic and flight patterns of the lax and santa monica airports.  i urgently started looking around for someone that i knew to show them, but there were only random strangers about.  so i began asking different adults and teenagers to look at the object too. not wanting to plant suggestions of any kind, i was saying things like "excuse me, i don't see that well, could you tell me what that is up there?", pointing to the object, which had now stopped and was hovering almost straight above.  everyone i asked pretty much had the same initial thoughts that i had had..."that's a jet...Oh..No...I think thats a balloon...No... it's...Uh...Hell i don't know what that is...Hey! you guys! look! what is that?!  i then thought, "maybe i can make it home so that i can show my roommate, since he's always wanted to see a "ufo".  home is only two blocks away, so i went for it, made it to the front door, looked up it was still there!  i went in the house and began telling him, "man, there's a ufo hovering straight up, right now! he headed for the front and i was headed for the back door and told him,"come-on, we can see it right here from the back!  well,...You know what happened when we went outside, nothing. it was nowhere to be found. i kept looking for about five more min. but nothing.  i'm reporting this in the hopes that someone else may seen this too.
content.summary: "pie-wedged" shaped object moving very slowly; turned sharp left, then hovered for approx. 10 min.

content.detailedDescription:
The recent sightings in oc- north oc have prompted me to repost what i posted on feb 2nd as the description of the craft matches what i saw early am on feb 2nd...The proximity to these sightings is very close to mine- the recent sightings are within sister cities just to the sw of me...I have included a valid email this time, so you folks can follow up w/me...Last time my post was deleted and labled "hoax"- it was not...I'm assuming it was because email address was invalid.

got up for glass of water in early am- looked out kitchen window and saw a horizontal group of lights close together and moving at same time in sw direction....Estimated to be headed toward huntington beach or cypress. add 2/21: the actual location would have been fullerton. low in sky. lights indicated a somewhat circular shape and were not quite flashing but would get brighter and then appear to become more pronounced. the way they gave off light was not like lights from a plane in the sense that they did not flash but merely got brighter at times. lights, perhaps 6-8, were white mostly and there was red light on one side and perhaps a green light on other side. was not a plane- this was lateral in the sense of the position of lights- moved collectively and slowly, deliberately toward hb area. this was viewed in north orange county. i watched for approxiamately 5 minutes as craft disappeared. time was 3-3:04am. this was not a plane or helicopter- grouping of lights indicated a laterally wide or perhaps oval shape. no sound.
content.summary: Repost from feb 2nd: north orange county.

content.detailedDescription: This was an event that was seen by my father who took a picture of it and sent this picture to me i have the picture on my iphone and can't download this without an email
content.summary: An object that emerged from behind a mountain and took off vertically.

content.detailedDescription: On friday, february 20, 2009 at about 8pm, i was driving south on the 5 freeway in slow, steady traffic; going maybe about 10 miles an hour. i was passing the city of commerce, approximately passing the commerce casino. above the freeway maybe about 200-300 feet in the air i spotted the ufo flying slow and steady heading south along the freeway. it was disc shaped and had a pattern of lights lining the circumference of the craft. the lights were changing patterns as it slowly rotated. as the ufo was rotating it was also moving south along the freeway. many other people should have been able to see it. when i first spotted it, it was almost directly above me. i watched it as it moved south for as long as i could until it become too far for me to see. the entire sighting lasted an approximate 10-15 minutes. this was my first sighting, but i have been long interested in the ufo phenomenon. when i spotted it, i immediately knew that it was a ufo without a doubt in my mind. it was close enough for me to see in detail. mi was in complete shock for the duration of the event, both in awe and wonder. as it moved further out of my line of sight, i found myself wanting to keep up with it and continue to see it. in short i was shocked and amazed, and i am certain there were many other people who saw it too.
content.summary: Ufo sighted flying south over the 5 freeway in commerce, ca.

content.detailedDescription:
My date and times are appoximate.  i was assigned as a police helicopoter observer with the pasadena police department and flying night patrol.  the pilot was {pid1}.  in the n/e area of pasadena, very close to the foothills, we observed what appeared to be a militar sikorsky helicopter hovering very low over a residential area.  the helicopter was turning it's landing light off and on.  as we got close, it gained elevation and started heading wesbound.  being curious we started to follow it.  we were approximately at 1,000 ft. agl.  the military helicopter then appeared to lose altitude quickly as if it was going into autorotation.  then about 300 meters past it we saw what first appeared to be a large object looking like bunch of big balloons tied together.  the object was going at our exact airspeed, which was about 60 mph.  the object was round and appeared to be rotating.  i saw no lights on it. pat began yelling over the intercom that he was seeing a ufo.  i immediatley shut off our running lights so i could activate our "nightstar" search light.  the running lights were shut off becuase there would be too many amps going through the system with all the lights on and pop a breaker.  shutting off the running lights to power up the searchlight was s.O.P.  pat questioned what i was doing and when i told him i was going to "light it up", he said, "no" and turned the running lights back on.  we had a short argument about doing this or not but he got the final word becuase he was the pilot.  we watched the object for a few minutes and it flew abeam us going west.  we then noticed that there was some fog coming in in the l.A. basin, which was a signal for us to fly back to bracket field in pomona, where we hangared the helicopter so as not to get caught in the fog.  as we approached the west end of the city near the rose bowl, this object gained speed and in just a few seconds accelerated towards the l.A. skyline and disappeared out of sight.  the speed it went was faster than supersonic.  we were both amazed at how fast it accellerated.

we came back to the hanger and immediatley started making calls.  pat called lax to see if they had any such object on thier radar.  he got a "negative" from them.  i called jpl in pasadena to see if they had any kind of experiment going on and they said no.  i was taken back by the repsone i got from them becuase the person i spoke to sounded like this was an everyday occurance.  we both wrote an incident report and turned it in.  i kept this to myself until one day, about 2 weeks later, the police chief saw me in the hallway and yelled, "hey al, did you see any more giant frisbees?".  since that time i have told this story to people but never made a big deal about it.  i also never found out if anyone forwarded that report or investigated it further.  i left the pd in 1979 to join the san luis obispo county sheriff's dept.

just thought i would tell this story to someone who would enjoy hearing it.  {pid2} passed away some time ago but i'm sure there are plenty of people that will remember tha story from the old days.

i have attached a picture of myself with {pid3} taken around the time this happened.  this photo was out of the pasadena star news on february 13, 1972
content.summary: Had ufo flying abeam the helicopter i was in while flying police patrol.

content.detailedDescription:
1. on the balcony
2. movement
3. star
4. three dots, look like stars,  moving together and finally making 
   triangle and suddenly disappear 
5. 1-st person:shock and awe
   2-nd person : excitement
6. suddenly disappear  in great speed
content.summary: Three dots moving together and finally making triangle and disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a date to the beach at night on rt. 70 towards long beach island, nj sometime in the fall or winter of '87/'88 - i think it was about nov.  it was cold and the shore was a ghost town with no one on the dark two lane road through the pine barrens.  growing up in the usaf i had been around all kinds of planes and was used to seeing them with quite a bit of knowledge.  while talking to my date i was watching the c141 sized objects in a line just over the tree tops and they were slowly catching up to me. i was doing 55mph.  i thought nothing of it being used to seeing military planes all around the area. when the first one reached just outside my window about 180 yards away i realized they were going too slow and would fall out of the sky so i asked her to roll down her window and there was no noise at all as they all started to pass us.  she became terrified and they slowly made a large turn over the pine barrens and i just lost them.  i witnessed them for about 25 min.  i saw no objects since then the road was unlit.  the lights looked similar to a jet and were a large spacing the size of a c141.  after about half an hour we were on the deserted beach and suddenly the sky lit up with military action.  jets were everwhere flying low and over the ocean and forest inland.  they were so low that we ducked one time.  i knew they were looking for something.  then they just disappeared and stopped.  the next day my mother told me that a small military jet went down in manahawkin bay and that was right by where i was.  the pilot was rescued by a fishing boat.  my father knew nothing since he had already retired years before. what did i see?  

facts:

c141 sized but no noise and flew 60mph very low - can't happen
military action just afterwards - why?
plane down in area - coincidence?

i've told very few people over the years and often wondered what i saw.
content.summary: 4 airline sized objects just over treetops flying 60mph, no sound, 1/5 mile apart in a line, no sound, near ft. dix/mcguire afb, half hourl later military action everywhere in sky looking for something flying over ocean and pine barrens.

content.detailedDescription:
Star-like circles bright in the night sky at 7:30.I was looking up at the starts to the south west direction when i focused in on 2 stars that were brighter than the rest around.They seemed to glow brighter and resembled a circle like shape more than the star-like.Suddenly the 2 stars very quickly switched positions and became even brighter.I felt as though they had gotten lower, and i didn't want to be out there alone anymore so i ran back inside.Very creepy if you ask me.But then again, i've seen a lot of creepy things lately*sigh*.I wish i knew why.
honestly i knew "they" were out there, and i wanted to see if they would come closer so i could get a better look.However i wasn't really ready for that and the realization frightened me.My husband made sure i wasn't gone but for 5 minutes,he seemed a little worried.After all that i have seen lately.I know this sounds crazy, but i assure you i'm very much sane,and i plan to prove that these things are out there,one way or another.
content.summary: I took a walk outside and was watching the stars, when 2 stars brighter than the rest suddenly switched places with each other. i wasn't expecting to see that and i felt i had seen enough so i ran inside, a little frightened.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter was sitting on the couch when she noticed a bright light out of the corner of her eye blinking outside the window.  when she approached the window to get a closer look, she noticed that the light was actually a series of white running/blinking lights which were moving in a circular motion around a single red light.  she then called me to the window and we both ran outside to get a clearer look.  it was moving in an easterly direction at a relatively slow speed for several minutes

we then called out for my daughter's boyfriend to come look.  he ran out to his car to get his binoculars.  over several more minutes we stood in awe passing the binoculars to each other, when suddenly it changed direction in a manner similar to that of an olympic swimmer, i.E. kind of flipping over while reversing direction.  the lights continued to "run" in a circular motion while it moved first closer to us then moved further away at the same speed although it seemed to be moving much further away at the same time

several hours later we're still talking about it and comparing notes on what we saw.  no doubt it was unidentifiable as an aircraft!!!
content.summary: Circle ufo with red blinking light and white blinking/running lights around it.

content.detailedDescription:
My 9 yr old saw a stationary "weird bright object" in the clear dark western sky around 7 p.M. tonight (2-20-09). we were driving south from aurora, il to oswego, il and my 9 yr old watched it for the entire 
15 minute ride. i thought it might be a bright planet. when we stopped in oswego my 9 yr old, 5 yr old and i got out of the car and looked at the bright object. it was a glowing bright yellowish color and looked as though it might have rings around it. it was extremely large and stationary. i thought it was much larger than when i saw jupiter at it's brightest several years ago. 

i went inside and checked on www.Earthsky.Org to see if maybe saturn or another planet was visible tonight. well, saturn will be in march but it will be dim. venus is visible but it is dim and we saw it tonight. there were no reports of other planets being visible. 

so then i saw the ufo examiner website and saw the photo at the top of the page http://www.Examiner.Com/x-2363-ufo-examiner~y2009m1d26-bright-lights-in-the-sky. the object we saw looked just like the photo but not as flat. 

my 9 yr old and i looked outside just before 9 p.M. to see it again but couldn't see it from the house. so at 9 p.M. we took a quick walk outside to try to find it and take a photo. the sky was clear full of stars and venus, but we did not see the object at all. it was gone.  the sky clouded over when we checked again at 9:34 p.M. and the stars are no longer visible. we're planning to check again tomorrow but snow coming into the area might keep the sky cloudy.
content.summary: My 2 kids and i saw glowing, bright, large, stationary saturn-like object in the clear, dark, western sky tonight around 7 p.M., by 9 p.M. it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in chat when i noticed from my window which is directly behind my computer a strange light that caught my attention because it was so bright that it caused me to look up and i know with out a doubt this was no earthly this was the first time i did not question it at all not even from the start because it was not normal first one light appeared that was white and shined like a planet and was the size of maybe a baseball and it blinked once then another light phased in right next to it and then they both blinked and then one light blinked which was the one on the right then the both of them blinked then one again then it morphed into one light and got smaller until it completely vanished both lights were the size of a baseball and were able to morph to one light as it vanished it made an s route to the sky and it appeared slightly tilted the whole time as well....Usually i feel very skeptic but this time i felt excited and ecstatic i felt positive and like there would be more to come.
content.summary: Lights over maryland state.

content.detailedDescription: Pic of high flying airplane at about one o'clock position a small white rod or something, didn't see it until on computer.
content.summary: White rod.
